title: Aesthetic (YC S18) Is Hiring a Full-Stack Web Engineer
description:
Role:

As Full-Stack Web Engineer, you’ll be a major contributor to shipping, iterating, and maintaining our flagship web application, coding both user-facing features and internal systems. 



Requirements:

- Experience building full-stack web applications with TypeScript, Node.js, React

- Experience with at least one web application framework (Rails, Django, Next.js, etc.)

- Experience with at least one RDBMS (PostgreSQL, MySQL, etc.)

- Experience with web technologies (browsers, networking, HTML, CSS, JavaScript)

- Interest in, and basic understanding of, NFTs and dApps

- Enthusiasm, proactiveness, empathy, self-drivenness, humility, creativity



Nice-to-Haves:

- Experience building mobile apps with React Native

- Experience with Heroku, AWS, or other cloud infrastructure services

- Familiarity with blockchain technologies and products

- Interest in NFTs, DeFi, DAOs, cryptocurrencies, etc.

- Interest in the mechanics of social networks and online communities



Responsibilities:

- Build, test, deploy, and maintain web application features

- Own frontend-to-backend development, QA, and bug-fixing for major features

- Talk directly to customers to understand their needs and requirements

- Participate in product development, recommending features and contributing to vision

- Consider security, performance, maintainability, and scalability in all of your work



Compensation:

- Package A: $140,000 salary, 0.2% equity

- Package B: $160,000 salary, 0.1% equity



Benefits:

- Supportive culture

- Teammates who are driven yet chill

- Fully remote

- Flexible hours

- 6 weeks vacation

- Medical + dental + vision

- Desk at coworking space (optional)
